Package io.micronaut.tracing.brave

Configuration for Brave tracing.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AsyncReporterConfiguration
    A configuration for async Reporting on Span instances.
    BraveTracerConfiguration
    A Configuration properties for Brave.
    BraveTracerConfiguration.HttpClientSenderConfiguration
    Used to configure HTTP trace sending under the tracing.zipkin.http namespace.
    BraveTracerConfiguration.SamplerConfiguration
    The sampler configuration.
    BraveTracerFactory
    Builds a Tracer for Brave using BraveTracer.
    BraveTracingInvocationInstrumenter
    Tracing invocation instrument for Brave.
    ZipkinServiceInstanceList
    A ServiceInstanceList for Zipkin.
